Title: Accomodations
Description: Please find below a list of accomodations that might help you choose for Villa Monte Kariotes as your next vacation home.

Accomodations.Description: Your furry friends are more than welcome. Your goldfish too.
A hot tub on the first floor.
A walk-in shower on the ground floor.
A built-in barbecue is available on the main terrace.
Your private swimmig pool, available in high season.
A smart tv in the living area.
A modern, fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher.
Three king-size beds and one sofa bed.
A parking spot is available on the property.
